product.name: Eddie Bauer - Case for Most Mobile Phones - Black
product.shortDescription: Compatible with most iPhones, mobile phones and Blackberrys; vinyl material; expandable sides
product.longDescription: Keep your mobile phone safe from bumps and scratches with this stylish case. The belt clip on the back provides easy portability.

product.name: Jabra - TALK Bluetooth Headset
product.shortDescription: Compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices; supports A2DP (v1.2), Hands Free Profile (v1.6) and Headset Profile (v1.2); up to 33' operating range; Voice Announcements; HD Voice
product.longDescription: Enjoy hands-free calling with this Jabra TALK Bluetooth headset that is compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices for wide-ranging use. Voice Announcements offer spoken battery and connection status updates for simple use.

product.name: Rocketfish™ - Mobile Multitip Vehicle Charger
product.shortDescription: Compatible with most mobile phones; interchangeable tips; gun-shaped design; intelligent IC chip; LED light ring
product.longDescription: This vehicle charger allows you to charge a variety of mobile phones via the interchangeable tips for versatile use, and the sleek, compact design makes for easy storage.

product.name: Rocketfish™ - Mobile Multitip Wall Charger
product.shortDescription: Compatible with most mobile phones; fits most standard DC outlets; interchangeable tips; 5V 1A rapid charging
product.longDescription: This wall charger fits most standard DC outlets and features interchangeable tips so you can charge a variety of mobile phones.

product.name: ZAGG - Smudge-Proof InvisibleSHIELD for Most Mobile Phones (2-Pack)
product.shortDescription: Compatible with most mobile phones; scratch-resistant, military-grade material; improves grip; 2-pack
product.longDescription: These shields are compatible with most mobile phones and resist fingerprints for improved visibility. Military-grade material helps protect against scratches.
